segments.text: morning , Mr . Winthrop . This is Sally Parker , Mr . Emory ’ s secretary . Mr . Emory has asked me to set up a meeting with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , Miss Parker , Let me get my book . My secretary ’ s out and I can ’ t keep anything straight !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . Would you like me to call you back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No – That ’ s all right . How about the 30th at 4:00 p . m . ? – Is an hour enough ?
segments.speaker: S2
